overview: The one-night-only special live stage event "RAY'Z MUSIC LIVE-STRAHL" held on September 9, 2022 at SELENEB2 in Shirokane-Takanawa, featuring songs from Taito's iconic shooting game "Ray" series, was fully recorded. The performers are Taito sound team ZUNTATA, former ZUNTATA member and DJ, COSIO, the creator of the RAY'Z series soundscape, TAMAYO, and vocalist Cyua's tribal techno unit "BETTA FLASH". The genre-defying performances of these artists will usher in a new era for the RAY'Z sound.
title: RAY'Z Music Live ~STRAHL~
